author: Microsoft
description:
e-Shram, India’s database for 300 million informal workers, is powered by Microsoft Azure and AI tools that guide workers toward regulated, better-paying jobs. Through the National Career Service portal, workers can use Azure OpenAI Service's generative AI tools to assess skills, generate resumes, and match with relevant jobs.

Read more about how it works: https://aka.ms/AAxjn7a

title: e-Shram: integrating AI to connect India's informal workers to better jobs with social security
